description: Enterprise techniques used by Gamaredon Group, ATT&CK group G0047 v1.0
name: Gamaredon Group (G0047)

techniques.comment: A Gamaredon Group file stealer has the capability to steal data from newly connected logical volumes on a system, including USB drives.
A Gamaredon Group file stealer transfers collected files to a hardcoded C2 server.
Gamaredon Group tools contained an application to check performance of USB flash drives.
Tools used by Gamaredon Group are capable of downloading and executing additional payloads.
Gamaredon Group has used various batch scripts to establish C2, download additional files, and conduct other functions.
A Gamaredon Group file stealer can communicate over HTTP for C2.
A Gamaredon Group file stealer can gather the victim's computer name and drive serial numbers to send to a C2 server.
A Gamaredon Group file stealer can gather the victim's username to send to a C2 server.
